    August 25-26, 2021

    National Gallery of Art

    Washington, D.C.

    Dave and EMac loaded cameras and suitcases into my car at 4:00 pm on Wednesday, August 25 and then debated the merits of Kanye West and Alt-Country Music for most of the three-hour drive to Washington, D.C.
